audioText: Cette tradition sacrée de notre village remonte à plusieurs siècles et unit toutes les générations.
question: What characterizes this village tradition?
options: It is sacred, centuries-old, and unites all generations
It is modern, innovative, and appeals to young people
It is seasonal, temporary, and changes every year
It is private, exclusive, and limited to certain families
explanation: The text states 'Cette tradition sacrée de notre village remonte à plusieurs siècles et unit toutes les générations.' - This sacred tradition of our village goes back several centuries and unites all generations. The adjective 'sacré' means sacred, holy, or revered.
